page.title: 18Housing and Housing Costs
page.content: {Little Sandhurst}has really only developed since the 1960's. We did a survey and found that{53%}of those returning the questionnaire lived in houses built in that decade. {19%} lived in houses built in the 1970's and {12%}in houses built in this decade. The returns also showed that{ {62%}of the people lived in detached houses and {23%}in semi-detached. The remainder were divided between bungalows, flats and a "cover all" section called "Other". Although the majority of people live in houses built within the last thirty years, there were some older homes identified in the returns. The oldest of these was built in 1710, and we had three houses which were built in the late Nineteenth Century. Only {12%} of the homes were built between 1900 and 1959.
